cz_binance.message:
MGX, an Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund, invests $2 billion in @Binance for a minority stake. The transaction will be 100% in crypto (stablecoins), marking it the largest investment transaction done in crypto to date.

This is also the first institutional investment @Binance has taken.

Onwards... Build!

APompliano.message:
From The Desk Of Anthony Pompliano

- Bitcoin and global liquidity
- Inflation may not be as bad as you think
- We live in the most prosperous time in history

Enjoy!

Everyone is telling you a big stock market crash is happening right now.

The data tells a different story. Don't get tricked by the masses.

Gas prices in America are the lowest they have been in 4 years.

Welcomed good news for millions of people.

Inflation just came in at 2.8% which is lower than expectations.

The real number is even lower.

The Fed should cut rates immediately.
Good morning. Today is going to be a great day. Letâ€™s get after it relentlessly.

RaoulGMI.message:
Not on holiday yet so I'll allow myself one more thread...

The markets are crazy! NFT are just jpegs! Dog coins! Cat coins! Tesla ! GameStop! 

Everyone is going to get burned! Don't they realize about discounted cash flows?!!! These people are ruining everything! Green energy?!

We are still early in the business cycle (using ISM) and as the ISM rises this year and into next year, crypto will rise with it.

Patience and less drama please! You know the #DFTU rules.
Over time, we just keep climbing the log regression channel. Whether we stay at the man (red) or climb above it by another standard deviation or two remains to be seen as the cycle develops.

sassal0x.message:
Pro tip for the bull market:

Don't get upset because someone else has made more money than you from crypto

We're all running our own race and comparison is truly the thief of joy - just enjoy the ride instead of coping over things that have no relevance on your life

I won't get into ETH talk too much, until I feel like the protocol roadmap is in a good place. For me it is always protocol first, asset second.

But I think ETH as monetary asset can only succeed if there are people for whom ETH comes first - I hope the Ether Guild will be that!

1/6 The US government prosecutors got caught withholding evidence in @rstormsf's case. They claimed at least $1B was laundered through Tornado Cash. But Chainalysis later admitted they wrongfully attributed over $300M to North Korea. 

The prosecutors hid this mistake because it weakens their case. Here's why this news is essential to Roman's case. â¤µï¸
